title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: As a customer, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains secure from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: The system must support MFA using SMS, email, or authentication apps.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a registered user, When I log in, Then I should be prompted to provide a second factor for authentication.
test_cases: Given I am a registered user, When I enter my credentials, Then I should receive a prompt for MFA.

title: Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
description: As a user, I want to access only services relevant to my role, so that I can use the platform effectively and securely.
attributes_and_rules: Access control must be based on predefined roles and permissions.
acceptance_criteria: Given a user with specific roles, When they log in, Then they should only see and access services permitted to their roles.
test_cases: Given a user with the admin role, When they log in, Then they should access all services.
Given a user with the guest role, When they log in, Then they should only access guest services.

title: Design Personalized Dashboard
description: As a user, I want to see a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products, so that I can easily access services that are suitable for me.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard elements must dynamically adjust based on user profile.
acceptance_criteria: Given a user profile, When the user accesses the dashboard, Then it should display banking products relevant to their profile.
test_cases: Given a user profile with credit card eligibility, When the user accesses the dashboard, Then it should display credit card products.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Develop Account Opening Workflow
description: As a user, I want to open new accounts via an online workflow, so that I can avoid visiting a branch.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow must validate user data and provide contextual guidance.
acceptance_criteria: Given account creation guidelines, When a user completes the workflow, Then the new account should be created and accessible.
test_cases: Given valid user data, When the user submits the account creation form, Then the account is created and the user receives confirmation.

title: Enable Status Tracking for Requests
description: As a user, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I stay informed about progress and pending actions.
attributes_and_rules: Tracking system must provide real-time updates and notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Given a submitted request, When the status changes, Then the user should see the real-time status and receive notifications.
test_cases: Given a pending request, When its status changes to approved, Then the user should see the updated status and receive an email notification.

title: Enable Application Draft Saving
description: As a user, I want to save my incomplete applications as drafts, so that I can continue later without losing progress.
attributes_and_rules: Drafts must be saved securely and retrievable by the user.
acceptance_criteria: Given an incomplete application, When the user saves it as a draft, Then the draft should be securely saved and retrievable.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, When the user clicks 'Save as Draft', Then the application data should be saved and retrievable later.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Synchronization
title: Implement Core Banking Integration
description: As a system administrator, I want the portal to integrate with core banking systems, so that data synchronization occurs in real-time.
attributes_and_rules: Integration must use secure APIs and ensure data integrity.
acceptance_criteria: Given an API endpoint, When a user makes a request, Then the core banking system should reflect the request in real-time.
test_cases: Given a request submission, When the system calls the API, Then the core banking details should synchronize immediately.

title: Implement Interaction History Logging
description: As a user, I want to view my interaction history for transparency, so that I have a record of my requests and activities.
attributes_and_rules: Logs must be kept securely and be retrievable by users and administrators.
acceptance_criteria: Given recent interactions, When a user accesses their history, Then they should see a log of all submitted requests and activities.
test_cases: Given a user's request history, When the user checks their interaction log, Then they should see all activities listed chronologically.

title: Implement Responsive Portal Design
description: As a user, I want the portal to be optimized for different devices, so that I can have a consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile.
attributes_and_rules: Design must adapt fluidly to varying screen sizes and resolutions.
acceptance_criteria: Given different devices, When a user accesses the portal, Then it should display optimally regardless of the device.
test_cases: Given access via desktop, tablet, and mobile, When the user opens the portal, Then the design should be responsive and consistent.
